page.title: 16The Warmington Valley #4
page.content:
The residents of the Villages will be happy because their property values will increase,with the improved commuterbility to London and Birmingam,but unhappy because of the terrific construction mess,noise and disruption that the Motorway building will bring.
But overall the permenant dessicration of this once beautiful and tranquil valley ,by traffic flow,fumes and the constant background noise of trucks will be the hardest part to accept and adjust to for the vast majority of villagers.
